messages.title: UKIP stands for CLEAN BREXIT
messages.content:
* Parliament to be supreme not the European Court of Justice.
* Retake our seat on the World Trade Organisation and resume our right to sign trade agreements with other countries.
* Resume control of immigration policy.
* Resume control of our maritime waters which the Tories refuse to commit to.
* No final settlement payment or ongoing payments to the EU for projects we are not involved in.
* Brexit must be completed before the end of 2019.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Additional 20,000 police. Additional 20,000 soldiers to rebuild our armed forces.
An Australian points-based immigration system is fair for all. Overall immigration must be reduced to allow public services to recover.

UKIP will reform the House of Lords, introduce a form of proportional representation and improve devolution to bring fairness to England, Scotland, Wales and N.Ireland. We will scrap the Human Rights Act and replace it with a British Bill of Rights.
We will confront the threat of multi-culturalism and extremism and defend hard won equality and free speech. This will include one legal system for all.
This will be enough to fund 20,000 nurses and 8,000 doctors. And we will still have money over to scrap hospital parking fees.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you are a Remainer, you will have a choice of candidates on June 8. If you voted Leave, the only choice you can trust is UKIP. Vote UKIP for a Clean Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement:
I have spent most of my 68 years living within this constituency. I have raised a family, and now have three grandchildren. I have worked hard all my life; and am now enjoying an active retirement.
My final job was in the care sector, now under attack from a central government which pushes its responsibilities onto local authorities so that it can claim not to have raised taxes. They hope we won't notice our council tax going up!
I have been blessed with good health, so I am fit and ready to serve you for the next five years.

examples: Additional 20,000 police. Additional 20,000 soldiers to rebuild our armed forces.
This will be enough to fund 20,000 nurses and 8,000 doctors.
Resume control of our maritime waters which the Tories refuse to commit to.
UKIP will reform the House of Lords, introduce a form of proportional representation and improve devolution to bring fairness to England, Scotland, Wales and N.Ireland.
We will confront the threat of multi-culturalism and extremism and defend hard won equality and free speech.
If you are a Remainer, you will have a choice of candidates on June 8. If you voted Leave, the only choice you can trust is UKIP.
I have been blessed with good health, so I am fit and ready to serve you for the next five years.
Parliament to be supreme not the European Court of Justice.
Retake our seat on the World Trade Organisation and resume our right to sign trade agreements with other countries.
No final settlement payment or ongoing payments to the EU for projects we are not involved in.
An Australian points-based immigration system is fair for all. Overall immigration must be reduced to allow public services to recover.
UKIP will reform the House of Lords, introduce a form of proportional representation and improve devolution to bring fairness to England, Scotland, Wales and N.Ireland.

personalStories.story:
I have spent most of my 68 years living within this constituency. I have raised a family, and now have three grandchildren. I have worked hard all my life; and am now enjoying an active retirement.
My final job was in the care sector, now under attack from a central government which pushes its responsibilities onto local authorities so that it can claim not to have raised taxes. They hope we won't notice our council tax going up!
I have been blessed with good health, so I am fit and ready to serve you for the next five years.

examples: My final job was in the care sector, now under attack from a central government which pushes its responsibilities onto local authorities so that it can claim not to have raised taxes. They hope we won't notice our council tax going up!
If you are a Remainer, you will have a choice of candidates on June 8. If you voted Leave, the only choice you can trust is UKIP.
Theresa May did nothing to stem the flow of immigration and passed up the opportunity to opt out of the iniquitous European Arrest Warrant.
